summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1338, for the improvement of Massachusetts Street, in the City of Seattle, from Railroad Avenue South to Centennial Place, by planking the same to width of sixty (60) feet, with five inch planking, under Ordinance No. 14984 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
